name: DMBX 2.6 - Mountain Bike and BMX
description:
DMBX Mountain Bike and BMX continues – featuring brand new Downhill, Slopestyle, Vert Ramp, Dirt-Pipe and Big Air levels, ghost and battle races, new bikes and individual characters from head-to-toe, replay options with video and picture export, completely new animations and physics, easy trick-steering and much more! Please welcome the freshest Mountain Bike and BMX action for your iPhone, iPod touch and iPad!

Did you ever want to drop into a vert ramp with your BMX? Or throw yourself over a big air? Maybe you are just about ready to conquer the steepest downhill ever? DMBX is finally here and it will be the perfect fit!
Choose and edit your individual character, find your bike or BMX to go along and let’s do it! Master the local challenges to unlock new tricks, new levels, bikes as well as characters and proof your skills against the very best players on the globe in a battle race.
If you are free from giddiness and ready for a new dimension - check out the brand new viewing angle option which can guarantee for an exclusive game experience that is one-of-a-kind! All levels - including the vert ramp and big air - can be played in this “First Person View” mode. In addition you can also change into the First Person View mode during the Replay Mode!

So what are you waiting for? Gear up and let`s go!!

FULL PACKAGE FEATURES
- 8 worlds
- 32 unique levels
- 168 challenges
- 8 individual male and female characters
- 6 different BMX/bikes with 20 designs to choose from
- individual trick setup
- „career" and „quick play" modes
- replay option with video & picture export
- training mode
- tilt- or virtual joystick navigation
- MFI Controller support
- camera view options
- listen to your own playlist
- iCloud synchronization
- Game Center achievements & leaderboards
- english and german language

COMPATIBLE DEVICES
DMBX 2.6 is compatible with 5th generation iPod touch, iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPhone 5C, iPhone 5S, iPad 2, 3rd and 4th generation iPad, iPad Air, iPad mini and iPad mini with Retina display. !!! ATTENTION !!! The game is NOT compatible with iPhone 4.


OPTIMIZED
DMBX 2.6 graphics are optimized for iPhone 5, iPhone 5C, iPhone 5S, iPad 4th generation, iPad Air and iPad mini with Retina display.


IN APP - FULL PACKAGE
The game offers an full-package via In-App purchase which allows to access and unlock all worlds, levels, tricks and bikes "through play". The package is available as a In-App purchase within the game and only need to be purchased once.


IN APP - UNLOCK PACKAGE
The game offers an unlock-package via In-App purchase which allows for a complete clearing of all tricks, characters, bikes and levels without having to beat each and every challenge. The package is available as a In-App purchase within the game and features the permanently clearing of every challenge that is present within DMBX 2.6. IMPORTANT: The unlock-package requires the full-package.


MFI CONTROLLER
Please visit www.rndrln-games.com/DMBX26/MFI/ to get more informations about the input mapping.


DMBX 2.x VERSION EXPLANATION
This DMBX 2.6 version is based on the available "premium" version DMBX 2.5 - Mountain Bike and BMX.


IMPORTANT NOTICE
In case you are experiencing difficulties starting the game, please fully close the app via multitasking, restart your device and try again. If this will not solve the problem, please delete the game, restart your device and re-install the game. Thank you.

If you experience any problems with the game or in case you have any questions or comments, please contact us directly - support(at)randerline.com. You may also contact us by visiting our website randerline.com. We will read and account for all reviews here, but we can only answer and help you via email. Thank you.
